body_text:
@mythmon is there a better way to fix this test? If I try to set it to something like timezone.now() I get a failure where last_updated doesn't match up:
{'last_updated': '2016-06-09T19:32:08.115291Z'} != {'last_updated': datetime.datetime(2016, 6, 9, 19, 32, 8, 120002, tzinfo=<UTC>)}
